item.title: By: Tracy Townsend
item.dc:creator: Tracy Townsend
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://lunastationquarterly.com/the-devil-in-the-details-the-right-good-virtues-of-making-a-world-bible/#comment-501">Don Early</a>.
Hi, Don!
This is a pretty short and tidy YouTube video walking you through one writers' process. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KUjet7Z0S0g I'm not sure about actual, intact world bibles out there that authors are using, as that tends to be rather behind-the-scenes in nature. You can find other templates out there, like this one which tends to focus more on nation-building than characters: https://theuncensoredwriter.wordpress.com/2017/03/14/the-ultimate-fantasy-world-building-template/
Happy writing!
Best, TT
